Text: No SubjectHi Maybe email is the best way to talk I actually do most of my communicating this way anyway I went to yoga last Wednesday night AND Saturday afternoon While I enjoyed the Wednesday class I hated the Saturday class It was a younger crowd and there were too many people I will continue to go to the Wednesday class but never again on the Saturday one However I like your idea of going on Sundays and I would not like to get stuck with just one instructor You are welcome to come on Wednesdays too it is blocks away from my house at Let me know what you think Susan Get color business cards for FREE vpfastpath
